description: The government in Madrid is poised to take emergency action after 191 deaths and 6,046 infections.
title: Coronavirus: Spain set to declare national lockdown
title_page: Coronavirus: Spain set to declare national lockdown - BBC News
maintext: All public transport would be cut back with airline, train, bus and boat operators told they need to cut their services by at least half and that any plane, train, bus or other means of transport can only be a third full, Reuters news agency reports.
